CustomField.description: This field is automatically computed. Its value represents the total 'lendable' value of all collateral (the children of this collateral) directly pledged to the same loan as this (the parent) piece of collateral.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is automatically computed. Its value represents the total 'lendable' value of all collateral (the children of this collateral) directly pledged to the same loan as this (the parent) piece of collateral.
CustomField.label: Total Pledged Rollup Lendable Value
